Detailed Description

Class BoxIOUtility supports writing and reading box information to an HDF file.

TODO: This class in used only in the application tests. Should it be moved there?

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum SAMRAI::hier::BoxIOUtility::IOTYPE

Enumerated type for specification of whether to read or write data.

  • READ { read from HDF database}
  • WRITE { write to HDF database};
Enumerator:
READ 
WRITE
